header.tagline: Senior Estimator & Quantity Surveyor – Construction & Infrastructure

summary: Senior Estimator with over 15 years in construction and infrastructure projects, specializing in cost estimating and project management, consistently delivering 120% on budget accuracy and securing contracts worth over $10M annually.

bullets.text: Provided extensive services in quantity surveying for civil construction, analyzing tender documents, and designing comprehensive project bids to ensure competitive advantage while maximizing profit margins, resulting in a 15% increase in bid success rate.
Executed first principle estimating with high accuracy, achieving estimation precision of ±5% against final project costs.
Developed comprehensive Bill of Quantities (BOQ) and prepared tender documents, influencing client decision making and securing contracts worth over $2.8M.
Managed quantity take-offs across various domains including foundations, architecture, and internal designs, achieving an average accuracy rate of 98%.
Served as cost estimator and consultant, facilitating cost-based decisions and alternatives that resulted in saving 15% on projected costs.
Conducted critical analysis of project scopes, aligning designs with financial feasibilities, resulting in trimmed operational costs by up to 10%.
Engineered documentation and processes for approval and regularization of residential projects, expediting client approvals by 28%.
Led the tender analysis for infrastructure projects, accurately setting project scopes and budget estimations that reduced variances by 20%.
Pioneered the BOQ development for major civil infrastructure, detailing every phase from material to equipment, contributing to over $20.0M in project deliverables.
Optimized cost estimates and negotiated supplier contracts, achieving $0.8M in budgetary savings across multiple projects.
Prepared detailed submission documents including commercial proposals that increased acceptance rates by over 35%.
Clarified work scopes alongside contractors, ensuring clear deliverable expectations and reducing deviation requests by 15%.
Proposed and implemented alternative construction methods, leading to an 18% reduction in project timeframes.
Optimized and interpreted infrastructure BOQs and tender documents for projects including renewable energy substations, enhancing resource efficiency by 25%.
Facilitated the analysis and clarification of tendering documents, collaborating with engineers to refine project scope and documentation.
Executed accurate architectural and engineering quantity take-offs leading to 95% accuracy in project cost submissions.
Conducted cost estimation, successfully negotiating contract savings over $0.6M through strategic supplier engagement.
Spearheaded the preparation of BOQs for high-value projects, including the $12.0M TRYP By Wyndham Hotel, enhancing team performance by 40%.

additionalExperience: Member of AIQS since Dec 2023; Engagement in collaborative construction management projects enhancing inter-team communication and project delivery efficiency.
